Name: Tonga
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of orange, lime & lemon slices.
Review: The rum and cognac flavours are masked by zesty orange.
Nutrition: One serving of Tonga contains 280 calories
